36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Do not talk too much without remembrance of Allah. Indeed excessive talking without remembrance of Allah hardens the heart. And indeed the furthest of people from Allah is the harsh-hearted

chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Talking Too Much Without The Remembrance Of Allah
